#{tszhjcsyl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ysjjcsyl = #{ysjjcsyl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sftzxm = #{sftzxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY update_date DESC
mapper.delete:
update pro_inv_basic set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and id in
#{model.id}
mapper.select: select , (SELECT d.label lab FROM sys_dict d inner join sys_dict_category c on d.category_id = c.id and c.del_flag = '0' where d.del_flag = '0' and c.category_code = 'TZMS_TZXX' AND d.value=inv_model) AS investPatten, (SELECT d.label lab FROM sys_dict d inner join sys_dict_category c on d.category_id = c.id and c.del_flag = '0' where d.del_flag = '0' and c.category_code = 'TA' AND d.value=pro_area) AS location from pro_inv_basic where del_flag = '0' and project_id = #{projectId}
